persistence.file.text

Class FilePersistence

  • Object
    • FilePersistence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistence

    public class FilePersistence
extends Object
implements Persistence
    FilePersistence is an implementation of Persistence interface providing a persistence contract between the application code and the underlying file system.
    Author:
    YingHao

                    throws NumberFormatException,
                           Exception
        Deserializes the specified string data into the field for the specified entity instance.
        Parameters:
        genericType - - The generic type of the containing class
        type - - The type to deserialize into.
        metadata - - The persistence metadata.
        valueString - - The string containing the serialized value.
        loadR - - A flag indicating if fields containing entity references are to be loaded.
        Returns:

                               boolean loadR,
                               boolean partial)
                       throws NumberFormatException,
                              IllegalArgumentException,
                              Exception
        Deserializes the specified string data into an entity instance.
        Parameters:
        entityString - - The string containing the serialized entity instance.
        loadR - - A flag indicating if fields containing entity references are to be loaded.
        partial - - A flag indicating if the deserialization should be partial and only load null fields in the specified entity.
        Returns:
        An entity instance representing the serialized data.
        Throws:
        Exception

        NumberFormatException

      • search

        public <T extends Entity> EntityIterable<T> search(Predicate<T> predicate,
                                          Class<T> type,
                                          boolean loadBeforePredicate)
                                        throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Persistence
        Searches through the given type and applying Predicate.test(Object) and returning matching entities.
        Specified by:
        search in interface Persistence
        Parameters:
        predicate - - Predicate indicating which entities to be accepted or rejected. Can be null, of which the entire list belonging to the specified type is retrieved.
        type - - Type of entity to be searched.
        loadBeforePredicate - - Indicates if all entity references should be loaded during predicate evaluation or after predicate evaluation.
        Returns:
        An Iterable that represents the managed entities that matches the given predicate.
        Throws:
        Exception

                               Class<T> type,
                               boolean loadBeforePredicate)
              throws Exception

        Searches through the given type and applying Predicate.test(Object) and returning the number of matching entities.
        Specified by:
        getCount in interface Persistence
        Parameters:
        predicate - - Predicate indicating which entities to be accepted or rejected. Can be null, of which the entire list belonging to the specified type is counted.
        type - - Type of entity to be searched.
        loadBeforePredicate - - Indicates if all entity references should be loaded during predicate evaluation or after predicate evaluation.
        Returns:
        long value indicating the number of entities that matches the predicate.
